column6: NECROSHA: NEW MUTANTS, CHAPTER 3 The New Mutants' part in NECROSHA comes to a close here! It's Doug Ramsey and the Hellions vs. Sam and his crew and it ain't looking good for our friends in the yellow and black.
column8: | inker:Adam Kubert | inker:Edgar Tadeo | penciller:Diogenes Neves | colorist:Justin Ponsor | colorist:John Rauch | writer:Zeb Wells
